Description: Fit Fusion is a fitness solutions provider, which provides tailored fitness packages and group sessions to the Customer. We excel in personal training, physical training, yoga and wellness sessions, sports conditioning, rehabilitation and physiotherapy.Currently we are looking for lead physical trainers for our company. You are expected to be a master trainer who is skilled to advice and track customer's fitness and strive towards achieving customers fitness goals.Skills
Skills:
Certification/Degree in Physical/Personal Training.
At least 2 years of experience in Personal training.
Excellent communication skills.
Positive attitude and a zeal to excel.
